author: Rajiv Tangri
title: The Game of Life
description: How do we get developers to develop on Cardano?
solution: Incentivized referral gaming. Creating a gaming system approachable to children. It looks like a game, but they are actually developing apps
experience:
I work in healthcare and have taught critical thinkers in the field.

Having a nephew who is 12, I know what Minecraft can be.
